mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( type, subject, content, writer_nickname, writer_email ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{writer_nickname}, #{writer_email} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{board_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) as upCnt FROM board WHERE type < 2
SELECT b.*, count(br.board_id) as reply_count FROM( SELECT * FROM board WHERE type < 2) as b LEFT JOIN board_reply as br on b.id = br.board_id GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY type, register_datetime desc

SELECT b.*, count(br.board_id) as reply_count FROM( SELECT * FROM board WHERE type = 2) as b LEFT JOIN board_reply as br ON b.id = br.board_id GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY register_datetime desc LIMIT #{startContent}, #{contentViewCnt}
SELECT count(*) FROM board_reply WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET read_count = read_count + 1 WHERE id = #{board_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM board WHERE subject like CONCAT('%', #{data}, '%') OR content like CONCAT('%', #{data}, '%')
SELECT count(id) FROM board WHERE writer_nickname like CONCAT('%', #{data}, '%')
SELECT * FROM board WHERE subject like CONCAT('%', #{data}, '%') OR content like CONCAT('%', #{data}, '%') ORDER BY register_datetime desc LIMIT #{startContent}, #{contentViewCnt}
SELECT * FROM board WHERE writer_nickname like CONCAT('%', #{data}, '%') ORDER BY register_datetime desc LIMIT #{startContent}, #{contentViewCnt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_reply( board_id, parent_id, depth, reply_content, reply_writer_nickname, reply_writer_email ) VALUES ( #{board_id}, #{parent_id}, #{depth}, #{reply_content}, #{reply_writer_nickname}, #{reply_writer_email} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board_reply WHERE board_id = #{board_id} ORDER BY regDate asc
SELECT regDate FROM board_reply WHERE reply_id = #{reply_id}
SELECT depth FROM board_reply WHERE reply_id = #{reply_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_reply WHERE reply_id = #{reply_id} OR parent_id = #{reply_id}
DELETE b, br FROM board as b JOIN board_reply as br ON b.id IN #{id} AND br.board_id IN #{id}
